name: Mini Footballgame
description:
This is a local Multiplayer Soccer Game I made in one week with the Unity gameengine. 

You can control the players with wasd and with the arrowkeys. The first player, who scores 3 points wins the match. There are 6 diffrent arenas unique features. Unfortunately I don' know how to make the game easyer, if you have an Idea let it me know.

It's avalible for Windows and for playing in the browser.
